channel.title: Lost Planet 2
channel.description:
Alright, so I am seriously torn about this one. On one hand, with APB gone, I find myself really REALLY missing a good coop third person shooter. Aliens are always fun and lost planet looks like it has a bit of a UT3 feel to it. (which is, for the most part, good)
On the other hand, well... I really don't know. does it look like it's worth it/ is anyone else getting it and why/whynot?

item.title: Lost Planet 2
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
I really liked the first one. It was a great monster-slaying, explosion-filled shooter with robots, so if I had the money to spare I’d pre-order right now. Although some of the reviews are a little off-putting, so I might wait to try it some time before buying.

Read full topic
